ingredients.ingredient: 2 ½ cups ; orange juice, divided ; (600 mL)
½ cup ; seltzer water, or champagne ; (120 mL)
orange, sliced into wheels, for garnish

steps.step: Fill an ice cube tray with about 2 cups (480 ml) of orange juice. Freeze for at least 2 hours.
Add the frozen orange juice cubes, remaining orange juice, and seltzer water to a blender and blend on high speed until smooth.
Pour into glasses and garnish with orange wheels.
